name: Record of Lodoss War: Advent of Cardice
name_original: Record of Lodoss War: Advent of Cardice
description: Record of Lodoss War: Advent of Cardice (Record of Lodoss War in North America and Europe) is an action role-playing game developed by Neverland for the Dreamcast. It was released in Japan on June 29, 2000; in Europe on December 15, 2000; and in North America on March 14, 2001. Based on the anime series of the same name, it is the only Lodoss video game to be released outside Japan.
